name: Jungel Jakt
overview: A Norwegian adventure game created in 1984 by Norace Computing using the Quill Adventure Writer System. MESSAGE FROM THE MANAGEMENT: WELCOME TO JUNGLE HUNTING. WE HOPE YOU WILL ENJOY THIS STORY GAME FOR MANY NIGHTS TO COME. Mr. Zabixu hopes that you are comfortable - and wants to stay as long as possible.-- Yes, in reality he hopes that you will be among the many guests who actually NEVER feel like they can leave him!! You are standing in the hall of Ogabwo Manor. In your subconscious, there is something that tells you that strange things have happened. Isn't this where the "JUNGLE PIRATE" Zabixu once lived? A smattering of dust and cobwebs lies everywhere. A silent wall clock with an opening that says half-timber. The evening sun sparkles a tray of silver! A recently written note lies on the table next to it...Will be back at five o'clock. What now?
